org.xchain.framework.util

Class EngineeringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.util.EngineeringUtil

  • public class EngineeringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to build engineered versions of commands and catalogs. TODO An explanation of why we're engineering classes.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Mike Moulton, Devon Tackett, Josh Kennedy

      • createClassPool

        public static javassist.ClassPool createClassPool(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Create a ClassPool which can access all the classes available to the given ClassLoader.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The ClassLoader to build the class path from.
        Returns:
        A ClassPool which can access classes available to the given ClassLoader.

      • engineerCommand

        public static javassist.CtClass engineerCommand(javassist.ClassPool classPool,
                                javassist.CtClass ctClass)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Engineer the given command class.
        Parameters:
        classPool - The ClassPool to build from.
        ctClass - The command class to engineer.
        Returns:
        The engineered command class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getEngineeredCommandName

        public static java.lang.String getEngineeredCommandName(javassist.CtClass originalClass)
        Build a unique engineered command name from the given CtClass.
        Parameters:
        originalClass - The class to build a unique engineered command name from.
        Returns:
        A unique engineered name for the given command CtClass.

      • getMethod

        public static javassist.CtMethod getMethod(javassist.CtClass ctClass,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           javassist.CtClass[] params)
        Find the CtMethod on the given class.
        Parameters:
        ctClass - The class to find the method on.
        name - The name of the method to find.
        params - The array of parameters that the method will use.
        Returns:
        The indicated method or null if the method could not be found.

      • getField

        public static javassist.CtField getField(javassist.CtClass ctClass,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Find the field on the given class.
        Parameters:
        ctClass - The class on which to find the field.
        name - The name of the field.
        Returns:
        The requested field or null if the field could not be found.

      • getCtClass

        public static javassist.CtClass getCtClass(javassist.ClassPool classPool,
                           java.lang.String name)
        Find the class in the pool for the given name.
        Parameters:
        classPool - The ClassPool to search through.
        name - The name of the class to find.
        Returns:
        The requested class. If the requested class could not be found a runtime exception will be throw.

      • subtypeOf

        public static boolean subtypeOf(javassist.CtClass ctClass,
                javassist.CtClass subtype)
        Determine if the given class is a subtype of the given type.
        Parameters:
        ctClass - The class to check.
        subtype - The subtype to check against.
        Returns:
        True if the given class is a subtype of the given subtype. This is also true if the given class is the same as the given subtype.
